Html:
Hi Radioman!

Could you please help me, I want to make a new MapProvider (basemap.at), i got a WMTSCapabilities.xml file: http://www.basemap.at/wmts/1.0.0/WMTSCapabilities.xml
I think it should be fairly easy to make a new map-provider out of this, but I'm not sure how to compose the URL to get the tiles...

Thanks a lot!

hello Xandolph,

with the tool Fiddler you can resolve the URL of the tilemaps. In your case for example this
MapTile.
Strange is the coordsystem they used. Perhaps you can change this. With QuantumGis you have a good tool to read the WMTSCapabilities(Supportet Geo-Coord, Layers, ...)
Hope this helps.
Bye EDE
